oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from soldier W.W. B. to friend Jennie
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from soldier W.W. B. to friend Jennie. This soldier is most likely Sgt. William W. Barlow, Co. D, 22nd Wisconsin Vol. Inf. Regt., USA. The letter references the second battle of Fort Donelson, which the regiment barely missed. This battle is sometimes called the battle of Dover and was fought between the Confederate Cav. of Joseph Wheeler and Nathan Bedford Forrest and the Union garrison at Dover. The battle was fought February 3, 1863.
